scripts.deploy:development: NITRO_PRESET=cloudflare nuxt build --dotenv .env.development && wrangler deploy --env development
scripts.deploy:preview: NITRO_PRESET=cloudflare nuxt build --dotenv .env.preview && wrangler deploy --env preview
scripts.deploy:production: NITRO_PRESET=cloudflare nuxt build --dotenv .env.production && wrangler deploy --env production
